TopicTitle: Set a Kerbal's mood on EVA

Articles.Content: Kerbals are very expressive when aboard a craft, but on EVA they always have a goofy smile. It would be useful for screenshots and stuff to be able to set their moods while on EVA.

Maybe a 'pose for mugshot' option in the right click menu.  The active kerbal smiles and those close by turn to face the camera or randomly do something silly in the background when you hit the screenshot button.
I feel a new mod lurking in the distance Wish I knew how to code. lol I love both of the above post.

If you want the smile, I've found just pressing "R" to activate the jetpack usually make them start smiling a lot. 

Just repress R and take your screenshot before they stop smiling.
